1072639320119525376.text: I launched https://NanaGram.co  a little over a year ago, as a way to stay in touch with grandparents & parents. We help you mail printed photos by text message.  We've mailed over 30,000 photos.  I'm a one-man shop. If you like the idea, please RT. Happy holidays.
